messages.content:
You are an AI assistant specialized in analyzing web projects developed using Java and the Spring Boot 2.x framework. I need to generate an OpenAPI Specification for a web project based on its backend source code. I'm now focusing on endpoint `/api/paste` with method POST, and here is the relevant information I found:

1. In `src/main/java/com/urcodebin/api/controllers/CodePasteController.java`, `CodePasteController#postNewCodePasteWith` is implemented to process HTTP requests to `/api/paste` with HTTP method POST.

I'll provide you with the contents of the files mentioned above, you have the option to execute additional Unix commands to gather more information if necessary, but you must not run the source code of the project, and your task is to generate a dict of Response Objects (the value of paths.[endpoint].[method].responses) in Swagger 2.0 format.

You need to think step by step and provide an explanation of your results first. Then, output exactly "the final generated result begins" (I will split your output and then do json parse, so you must output it and do not change it), followed by the dict of Response Objects in JSON format. Do not include fields not mentioned above, and do not use references ($ref) in your output (try to obtain the structure by executing additional Unix commands).

I will analyze the repository to determine the response schema for the POST /api/paste endpoint. Specifically, I will inspect related DTOs (CodePasteDTO) and the request body (UploadPasteRequestBody) to inline the response schema in Swagger 2.0 format, as required. Now I will run commands to locate and inspect these classes.
Tool call limit reached. Tool call run_command not executed. Don't try to execute it again.

function.name: run_command
function.description: Run a Unix command and get outputs in the project directory. You must not run any source code of the project.
